mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_Persn (persnnm, birthdate, birthyear, birthmonth, birthday, sex, phone, tel, email, zip, addrstret, addrlotnum, addr2, addr3, educt, job, scholnm, scholmajor, scholgrade, jobnm, jobduty, insid, insdt ) VALUES ( #{persnNm}, #{birthDate}, #{birthYear}, #{birthMonth}, #{birthDay}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{zip}, #{addrStret}, #{addrLotNum}, #{addr2}, #{addr3}, #{educt}, #{job}, #{scholNm}, #{scholMajor}, #{scholGrade}, #{jobNm}, #{jobDuty}, #{insId}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'))
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS persnId
